reasoning: Extremely rare genetic skeletal dysplasia caused by ACAN mutations. Fewer than 100 cases reported globally. Less than 0.01 per 100k birth incidence based on case frequency in literature.
source: Gleghorn L et al. (2005). A mutation in the variable repeat region of the ACAN gene causes a form of spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia. Am J Hum Genet. 77(4):657-666
